name: Lyt Pedal Boards
short_description:
An awesome arsenal a guitarist can add to his bag of tricks is the sound effects. The squeaky, beeping, blipping, echo and many more of such sound effects, are one of the greatest aid to a guitarist. We did a little research to analyze what does it take to produce such sound effects and what makes it possible to do so. Since the invention and after the development of the electric guitar, every benefit of the sound effects has been taken by the rock music, so in order to create a creative and distinctive style that is not found in any other form of music. One can examine the easily identifiable sound effects induced by implementing innovative tricks. Such techniques and tricks were & are; only possible due to the pedals and pedal boards.

LYT Pedalboards brings you a wide range of pedal boards. We have given you the provision to elect the most appropriate board according to your requirements.
